Key Match Events: England's experimental formation against Greece led to a 2-1 defeat
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley opted for an attacking formation without a striker due to Harry Kane's injury
Post-Match Reflections: Carsley admitted the formation didn't work and promised a different approach for the next match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat prompted a rethink in tactics and team selection
Others: The match was part of the Nations League campaign
